features: LED FLASHING LIGHTS AND ELECTRONIC SOUNDS: The police car makes three different realistic sounds. You can turn on your sirens, honk the horn or rev up the engine. Lights flash when you push the buttons for maximum fun.
ELECTRIC MOTOR: Push the button to activate the motorized engine and speed to your next destination. Go on an exciting rescue mission with the huge police car.
SOFT SUPER GRIP TIRES: The treaded rubber tires really spin, enhancing imaginative play. Get ready for a super smooth ride.
LARGE TOY: Almost 12'' long, this Police SUV is created with high quality realistic styling and durable materials for hours of creative play and cognitive development.
IMAGINATIVE PLAY: Young police officers ages three and up can protect their town and explore their imaginations with this action-packed vehicle!
IDEAL GIFT: This toy car is a great gift idea. With all the cool features, it is perfect for both little boys and girls. Give it as a birthday, Christmas or special occasion gift.
body.description: Young police officers can respond to pretend missions with the Maxx Action Police SUV. Measuring almost 12 inches long, this rescue vehicle can take on any task imaginable. The bright LED lights will light up any room while the automotive sound effects and realistic sirens make for exciting and engaging playtime. Equipped with a motorized engine, take off at high speeds with the push of a button. Soft super grip tires allow for a long and smooth ride to any pretend emergency. With authentic details and the ultra-realistic features, kids will have hours of exciting imaginative play.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large Rescue Toy This Police SUV is almost 12" long, giving kids a bigger and better rescue play experience! Created with high quality realistic styling and durable materials for hours of imaginative play and cognitive development. Perfect for high speed chases and criminal-catching missions! Flashing Lights and Electronic Sounds The Police SUV makes three different realistic car sounds. You can turn on the sirens, honk the horn, and rev up the engine! Lights flash when you push the buttons on the roof for maximum fun! These features make play feel realistic and ultra engaging. Electric Motor and Super Grip Tires Get ready for an action-packed ride! Press the button on top of your SUV to activate the motorized engine and make it to your next destination quickly! The car's treaded rubber tires really spin, bringing imaginative rescue play to life!

Great gift for little heroes! This toy makes a great gift for kids ages 3 and up! With the fun features and realistic details, the Large Police SUV is perfect for both little boys and girls. Give it as a birthday, Christmas, or special occasion gift!

About Sunny Days Entertainment Our History Sunny Days is a leading supplier, distributor, and manufacturer of branded and licensed toys across multiple product categories. We focus on providing fun & affordable toys for children! Our Mission Based in South Carolina, we are comprised of a core group of toy industry veterans with a mission of spreading sunshine through traditional, creative play. Our Toys Each toy is created to enhance the experience for children, expand their imaginations and encourage them to unplug and play. Designed with safety in mind, all of our toys are thoroughly tested to meet the highest standards possible. Our Promise At Sunny Days, we stand by our superior quality and want to ensure complete satisfaction. If you experience any trouble, please reach out to our team so we can make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Grandson Loves This
reviews.reviewText: My grandson (4) LOVES this police car. For something plastic, it is very durable, and the price was amazing. I wasn't expecting much, I figured he'd break it pretty soon because he's hard on toys. But, it still survives. It has really cool lights on it and a siren (I think). It is not real obvious, in the directions, but you have to read through them, that you need to change the batteries when you get it for it to automatically move forward. Then the lights and the wheels turn. The lights will work if you just use the batteries that come with it but change them and both work. I think I paid less than $20 for this....for Valentine's Day and he was thrilled with it and still plays with it and took it to school for Show and Tell. And his sister was upset that I bought her a doll instead of something like this! So worth it. I liked it so much that I bought the fire engine too....for his birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Police Car
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this as a gift for my nephew and he loved it. Thought it was going to be small but it’s pretty big and the best part is the siren noises. A great gift for a kid that is into police cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for our 3-year-old grandson. He loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Five year old loves it
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this truck for my five year old as a birthday present. He absolutely loves it. He loves that it looks totally different from the traditional looking police car that we used to have. The lights and sirens worked great for a while and make it a very exciting toy to play with. However, they do not work as well as they did when we first got it. Friends that have come to our house have also loved playing with it as well. It is definitely and great gift for any kid who love cars, trucks and police vehicles! It was also a very affordable price compared to many others that I looked at.

reviews.reviewText: Definitely a little kids toy...Does make some noises so prepare for that.Kids will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not work well
reviews.reviewText: My son got this car for Christmas and he loves cars that go on there own by pushing a button. I had to change the batteries as soon as he opened it for the tires to even move. It does not work well on carpet at all.

si me gustaron ya que tiene sonidos y son buenas en su funcion , lo unico malo no entiendo venian con la pila reventada, tuvimos que limpiar los resorte y colocar pilas nuevas. ya que estas tenian todo el liquido de las pilas derramado.
Never buy it. I got broken one. I ordered as a gift, but it took so long and looks used. Also expensive. Never recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not new and motor does not work
reviews.reviewText: Toy is fine (a bit cheap), but it was clear that it had been removed from packaging at some point before dispatch... so this is not a new product. I'd like to know why. Given cost, I expected better. Sticky tape on box and toy not secured in box by plastic clips. Also, motorised motor does not work. Suspect it was just a re-send of an already returned purchase based on reviews.
Lovely police vehicle with sounds push snd go very very good price. My grandson loved it
